alert.note: Alert for Allendale (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 9:37PM EDT until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Savannah River at Burtons Ferry. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.2 feet, the picnic area at Stoney Bluff Landing becomes flooded. Access to the house at the end of Stoney Bluff Landing Road is limited. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 845 PM EDT Saturday, the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.3 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then rise to 17.6 feet Thursday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
